message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high to me. How about we meet in the middle at $150?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.
